remarks: Any function from the subsets of a set to itself, which is extensive (satisfies ~ mrcssid ), isotone (satisfies ~ mrcss ), and idempotent (satisfies ~ mrcidm ) has a collection of fixed points which is a Moore collection, and itself is the closure operator for that collection. This can be taken as an alternate definition for the closure operators. This is the first half, ~ ismrcd2 is the second.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 1-Feb-2015.)

ismrcd.i $e |- ( ( ph /\ x C_ B ) -> ( F ` ( F ` x ) ) = ( F ` x ) ) $.
